<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/2934</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/2934</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">La ciència del segle XX</string>
            <string language="en">Twentieth century science</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zwanzigste Jahrhundertwissenschaft</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La vingtième science de siècle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Vigésima ciência do século</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ventesima scienza di secolo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη του εικοστού αιώνα</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Crèdit variable interdisciplinar amb continguts sobre relativitat, mecànica quàntica, indústria química, genètica, evolució, medicina, astronàutica, transports, informació i energia i ambient. Conté pàgines d'informació, activitats interactives, un glossari i enllaços a altres pàgines.</string>
            <string language="en">An interdisciplinary variable credit on relativity, quantum mechanics, the chemical industry, genetics, evolution, medicine, astronautics, transport, information, and energy and the environment. It includes information pages, interactive activities, a glossary, and links to other pages.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">intel·ligència artificial</string>
            <string language="en">artificial intelligence</string>
            <string language="es">inteligencia artificial</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">electromagnetisme</string>
            <string language="en">electromagnetism</string>
            <string language="es">electromagnetismo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">evolució (biologia)</string>
            <string language="en">evolution (biology)</string>
            <string language="es">evolución (biología)</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">tecnologies de la informació i la comunicació</string>
            <string language="en">information and communications technology</string>
            <string language="es">tecnologías de la información y la comunicación</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">mecànica quàntica</string>
            <string language="en">quantum mechanics</string>
            <string language="es">mecánica cuántica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">ciències de l'espai</string>
            <string language="en">space sciences</string>
            <string language="es">ciencias del espacio</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine interdisziplinäre variable Gutschrift auf 
Relativität, Quantummechaniker, die chemische Industrie, Genetik, 
Entwicklung, Medizin, Astronautik, Transport, Informationen und 
Energie und die Umgebung. Es schließt Informationen Seiten, 
interaktive Aktivitäten, ein Glossar und Links zu anderen Seiten ein.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un degré de solvabilité variable interdisciplinaire sur la 
relativité, la mécanique quantique, l'industrie chimique, la 
génétique, évolution, médecine, astronautique, transport, 
information, et énergie et l'environnement. Il inclut des pages
de l'information, des activités interactives, un glossaire, et des 
liens à d'autres pages.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um crédito variável interdisciplinary no 
relativity, os mecânicos do quantum, a indústria química, genetics,
evolução, medicina, astronáutica, transporte, informação, e 
energia e o ambiente. Inclui páginas da informação, 
atividades interativas, um glossário, e as ligações a outras 
páginas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un accreditamento variabile interdisciplinare su 
relatività, meccanici di quantum, l'industria chimica, la genetica, 
sviluppo, medicina, astronautica, trasporto, le informazioni ed 
energia e l'ambiente. Include le pagine delle informazioni, le 
attività interattive, un glossario ed i collegamenti ad altre pagine.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια διεπιστημονική μεταβλητή πίστωση στη σχετικότητα, 
τους κβαντικούς μηχανικούς, τη χημική βιομηχανία, τη γενετική, 
την εξέλιξη, την ιατρική, την αστροναυτική, τη μεταφορά, τις 
πληροφορίες, και την ενέργεια και το περιβάλλον. 
Περιλαμβάνει τις σελίδες πληροφοριών, τις διαλογικές 
δραστηριότητες, ένα γλωσσάρι, και τις συνδέσεις με άλλες 
σελίδες.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">künstliche Intelligenz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Elektromagnetismus</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Entwicklung (Biologie)</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Informations- und Kommunikationstechnik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Quantummechaniker</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
